about_the_game:
The cheesy space schnitzel, monsters and guns, old smackdonald, freaky forest, killing friends, or the first day in forestry. Name it whatever you want, the ultimate action-packed FPS/CTF/RPG is here. Plus, this game is funny as hell. Start playing today!

What does the game offer?
As we develop the Early Access, we plan to gradually add content and features.

The current game release 0.1.0 includes the following:
- Single-player mode with 4 playable maps
- 3 weapons to shoot 50+ monsters, drone and turret Zone defenders
- Early Access is based on the capture the flag game principle
- The game is equipped with in-game statistics and scoring to analyze the play
- We plan to develop multiplayer based on the experience. Join us!
Join our community on social media and the dev team in their quest to create "The funniest FPS out there."

Twitter randyandteddy
Reddit RandyAndTeddy

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K @3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 @4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 (2GB VRAM)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 8600M or better / ATI Radeon HD 2400 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra 10.12.1 or newer
  • Processor: AMD A10-7850K, 3.7 GHz / Intel Core i3-2125, 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Forest Grump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1650 or Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600X processor
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / GTX 1660 or Radeon R9 390 / AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card or onboard chipset
